attacks.name: CYBERBLADE_OPT1
attacks.description: Move 1 square before or after the basic effect.

attacks.name: CYBERBLADE_OPT2
attacks.description: Deal 2 damage to a different target on your square. The shadowstep may be used before or after this effect.

baseAttack.name: CYBERBLADE_BASE
baseAttack.description: Deal 2 damage to 1 target on your square.
